GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.26 to before v4.14.283
GSD.description:
Input: sparcspkr - fix refcount leak in bbc_beep_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit f13064b0f2c651a3fbb0749932795c6fd21556a8, it was introduced in version v2.6.26 by commit 9c1a5077fdca99356c891af37931e537dea874f5. For more details please see the references link.
